suite.name: Amazon Testes

test.name: Caso de teste 01 - Acesso ao menu "Eletrônicos"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: InvalidSelectorException: Message: invalid selector: Unable to locate an element with the xpath expression //a[@href='/Eletronicos-e-Tecnologia/b/?ie=UTF8&node=16209062011&ref_=nav_cs_electronics'][contains('Eletrônicos')] because of the following error: SyntaxError: Failed to execute 'evaluate' on 'Document': The string '//a[@href='/Eletronicos-e-Tecnologia/b/?ie=UTF8&node=16209062011&ref_=nav_cs_electronics'][contains('Eletrônicos')]' is not a valid XPath expression. test.doc: Esse teste verifica o menu eletrônicos do site dda Amzon.com.br e verifica a categoria Computadores e Informática
